1.notes: SCIE 113, ENGL 110, ENGL 111, ENGL 112, ENGL 120, ENGL 121, WRDS 150
A 6-credit combination of two courses may substitute for a 4-credit course to satisfy the specified requirement by decreasing the electives in any year by 2 credits.

MATH_V 180 or 184 or 120 may substitute for any of the specified differential calculus courses listed and elective credits reduced by 1. MATH_V 110 may substitute for any of the specified differential calculus courses listed and the elective credits decreased by 3.
MATH_V 121 may substitute for any of the specified integral calculus courses listed and the elective credits decreased by 1.

Elective credits together with required courses must fulfill the Faculty of Science’s: a) Foundational Requirement ; b) Laboratory Science Requirement ; c) Science Breadth Requirement ; d) Science and Arts Requirements ; e) Upper-level Requirement ; f) General Degree Requirements .

2.notes: Note that MATH_V 210 may not be offered every year. Students taking MATH_V 210 require an additional credit toward elective requirements.

Elective credits together with required courses must fulfill the Faculty of Science’s: a) Foundational Requirement ; b) Laboratory Science Requirement ; c) Science Breadth Requirement ; d) Science and Arts Requirements ; e) Upper-level Requirement ; f) General Degree Requirements .
